import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/PredictedStats.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_URL='https://nba-premier-stats-a373f9b1c4a8.herokuapp.com';function PredictedStats(){const[player,setPlayer]=useState('');const[playerData,setPlayerData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{if(player){const formattedPlayer=player.replace(/\s+/g,'_');console.log(formattedPlayer);axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/api/predictions/player?playerName=").concat(formattedPlayer)).then(response=>{setPlayerData(response.data);// Assuming response.data is a single player object
}).catch(error=>{console.error(error);});}},[player]);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const playerName=e.target.elements.playerName.value;setPlayer(playerName);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Predict",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Stats Predictor for the 2024-25 season"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Type any active NBA player's name below"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Enter Player Name:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"playerName"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Get Predicted Stats"})]}),playerData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:'stats',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Predicted Stats for ",playerData.player.replace('_',' ')," for the 2024-25 Season"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Points: ",playerData.pts]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Assists: ",playerData['ast']]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Rebounds: ",playerData.reb]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Steals: ",playerData.stl]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Blocks: ",playerData.blk]})]})]});}export default PredictedStats;
